requirements.title: Academic Transcripts
requirements.description: Official transcripts from all previously attended institutions

requirements.title: Letters of Recommendation
requirements.description: Two letters of recommendation from academic or professional references

requirements.title: Statement of Purpose
requirements.description: A 500-1000 word statement outlining your goals and motivation for the program

requirements.title: GRE Scores
requirements.description: Graduate Record Examination scores (recommended but not required)

process.title: Submit Online Application
process.description: Complete the online application form with personal and academic information

process.title: Upload Required Documents
process.description: Upload all required documents including transcripts, letters of recommendation, and statement of purpose

process.title: Application Review
process.description: Our admissions committee will review your application and supporting materials

process.title: Interview (if selected)
process.description: Selected candidates may be invited for an interview with faculty members

process.title: Admission Decision
process.description: You will receive notification of the admission decision via email and postal mail

deadlines.description: Final deadline for submitting online application
Final deadline for submitting all supporting documents
Admission decisions will be sent by this date

faq.question: What is the minimum GPA requirement?
faq.answer: We require a minimum GPA of 3.0 from your undergraduate degree. However, competitive applicants typically have a GPA of 3.5 or higher.

faq.question: Is programming experience required?
faq.answer: Yes, applicants should have programming experience in Python or R. We recommend completing online courses or tutorials if you lack this background.

faq.question: Can I apply if my undergraduate degree is not in a STEM field?
faq.answer: Yes, we consider applicants from diverse academic backgrounds. However, you must demonstrate proficiency in mathematics and programming through coursework or professional experience.

faq.question: Is financial aid available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer various forms of financial aid including scholarships, assistantships, and federal financial aid. Contact our financial aid office for more information.

requirements.title: Professional License
requirements.description: Current healthcare professional license or medical degree

process.title: Submit Application
process.description: Complete the online application with professional background information

process.title: Document Verification
process.description: Our team will verify your professional credentials

process.title: Enrollment Confirmation
process.description: You will receive enrollment confirmation and access to the online platform

faq.question: Can I start the program at any time?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a self-paced online program that you can start at any time throughout the year.

faq.question: How long do I have to complete the certificate?
faq.answer: You have up to 12 months from enrollment to complete all course requirements.
